answers.answer: Are these results in mmol/l? Not sure what you're asking....r u you asking why your meter results are different than the lab?What are you doing to control and manage your diabetes?
I have been taking my diet and exercise very seriously.My meter readings are basically out of control  and my lab reports are very good. Something is wrong.

question: Most resent lab results are 30 day avg. 5.5 the previous was 6.5. Checking with my meter every morning before breakfast my 7 day is 10.5 my 30 day is 10.2. The clinic check my meter and it's good. I've had maybe 5 tests below 7 and below 6 in 8 months.I've started checking different times of day and still don't get anything like the lab.
title: Lab vs Meter
